n: Mom's Pie Crust for a Double Crust Pie
des: "I got this from my mother. She has used it for as long as she has been baking. It is very easy to make and tastes wonderful. I use heaping tablespoons of shortening because I like a very short crust."
ins: Sift flour and salt together in a bowl. Cut in shortening until it looks like coarse crumbs. Add water until dough forms.
